entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain over eastern sections. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain over eastern sections early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
